column4: How do I use ndiswrapper to setup Wi-Fi setup on my Dell Inspiron 8600 with a Dell (Broadcom Wi-Fi card?
isnt it a centrino built-in wlanchip?
no its a Broadcom.  I got it because it was A/B/G wireless
Dell calls it a Dell card but they re-sell it and it is really a Broadcom manufactured card
